channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260123)
item.description:
What's New

Optimize focus monitoring and improve rule dialog UI

  • Remove 1-second polling timer for focus check, rely solely on AXObserver (event-driven)
  • Refactor AddRuleSheet to use tabbed interface (Basic/AX Matching/Behavior tabs)
  • Fix dialog height issue - now fits within screen with scrollable content
  • Update build version to 20260123

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
